name: Venusian Vengeance
description: In the year is 196X the communists won the space race and colonized Venus. Now the Americans have sent Sgt. Jon Dagger to Venus to destroy the Secret Soviet Science Facility.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.33GHz x86-compatible processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Better Processor: 2.33GHz x86-compatible processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: This game is straightforward, a little quirky, and a straight good time. Fun with a decent difficulty curve that can change with Hard Mode. The 8-bit art design and music is reminscent of an early age of games, and the soundtrack is pretty good. A solid, entertaining, bizarre adventure through Soviet-occupied Venus.
If you like twin-stick shooters and you've got an hour to kill, you'll enjoy this game. Well it's like a twin-stick shooter; it doesn't support controllers.
